title: Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi honors Imam Hussain’s legacy on Ashura Day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi paid tribute to Imam Hussain on the solemn occasion of Ashura Day, who courageously stood up against oppression and tyranny, inspiring generations to come.
In a heartfelt message, Naqvi hailed Imam Hussain’s unwavering commitment to truth and his unrelenting struggle against falsehood, emphasizing the timeless lessons of his philosophy.
Mohsin Naqvi commemorated the sacrifice of Imam Hussain, the grandson of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him).
Naqvi praised Imam Hussain’s bravery and conviction, which have become a beacon of hope for humanity.
He emphasized that Imam Hussain’s philosophy teaches us to stand firm against oppression, to be patient in the face of adversity, and to uphold the truth at all costs.
Naqvi also drew parallels between the ancient Battle of Karbala and modern-day struggles, urging the nation to unite against evil forces and to follow Imam Hussain’s teachings.
He expressed his hope that the sacrifices of Imam Hussain and his companions will continue to inspire oppressed people around the world.
The minister concluded by praying for the ability to follow in Imam Hussain’s footsteps and to remain steadfast in the pursuit of truth and justice.
